text: Gu khar ndu nzuai buni guari, ndu tuituigip nta ndɨkndɨk suirari. Ndu nta suirav, ndu gu gumgi gu mbigi khɨvav, mbe nzuai tɨva zɨn ŋgɨp, mbe suaŋri. Maaŋ muuŋgiap, ndu khaŋ tɨgɨp havhargip, nza guigira Krais Zisas khothɨgap, guigira wari won ndavir harigi gumgi ga ndɨɨi, gumgi gu mbigi mbui tɨvara suira havhargip, nza guigira Kraisan gumgi gu mbigi kɨv, nza khaŋ tɨgɨp mba tɨva phuni suirav havhargiri.
